mean_cn: n. 水力发出的电力，水利发电
mean_en: electricity produced from machines that are run by moving water
word_etyma: hydro水+power电力 → 使水变成电的过程 →水力发电
short_phrase: a hydropower plant on the river
sentence: Cities near big rivers often get their electricity from hydropower plants.
sentence_trans: 靠近大江大河的城市通常通过水利发电站用电。
